channel.title: Need help with more than one thing!
channel.description:
Alright hey guys, i just started coding my server today and i have just a few question. please answer.
1. How do i open a Config file? 2. How do i move a npc(shops)
Thats it just need those 2 awnsered please help!

item.title: Need help with more than one thing!
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

when opening a config file when u click on it click open from a list and click notepad

Read full topic
